content: this beginner-friendly knitting pattern features a textured seed stitch design that adds depth and interest to your project available in sizes for adults and children with customization options for a perfect fit the pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial for extra guidance crafted with caron simply me bulky yarn this headband is quick to knit up and offers a snug and stylish finish **unique features-** beginner-friendly pattern for all skill levels textured seed stitch design adds visual interest available in sizes for adults and children detailed written instructions and video tutorial included crafted with cozy caron simply me bulky yarn **materials needed-** needle 8mm us size 11 0 yarn **caron simply me** https //shrsl com/4vrrm bulky weight 50-51 yards
